definitions.definition: A purplish-red pigment , made from dye obtained from the cochineal beetle; carminic acid or any of its derivatives .
A purplish - red colour , resembling that pigment.

main_definition: A purplish-red pigment , made from dye obtained from the cochineal beetle; carminic acid or any of its derivatives .
secondary_definitions: A purplish - red colour , resembling that pigment.
